ref.mixed-citation:

M. O. Little , and
R. Faden , “ The Second Wave: Toward Responsible Inclusion of Pregnant Women in Research,” International Journal of Feminist Approaches in Bioethics 1, no. 2 ( 2008): 5– 22; Margaret, M. O., and M.
